alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Greeley; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Thayer; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 3:50AM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER CONDITIONS IMPROVING WITH TIME TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Lingering light snow and blowing snow that has already fallen. Additional snow accumulations less than 1 inch. North-northwest winds gusting 35 to 45 MPH this morning, but very slowly decreasing with time. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central, and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Although the vast majority of falling snow has ended, continued strong north-northwest winds this morning will result in continued blowing snow, which could still reduce visibility and cause near-blizzard conditions, especially in open, rural areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind speeds will steadily decrease with time this afternoon, resulting in improving conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Greeley; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Thayer; York
